Class LimitType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.interpss.numeric.datatype.LimitType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LimitExpression

    public class LimitType
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Limits class for (max, min) limits
    See Also:

        tolerance -
        Returns:

      • limit

        public double limit(double x)
        Perform limit action. if max >= x >= min return x, if max < x return max, if x < min return min.
        Returns:
        the resulting number

      • limitDiscrete

        public double limitDiscrete(double x,
                            double stepSize)
                     throws IpssNumericException
        Perform discrete limit action. if max >= x >= min return the closest discrete point, if max < x return max, if x < min return min.
        Returns:
        the resulting number
        Throws:
        IpssNumericException
